div.p: (Translation: P. L. Bat. 25.19) Apollonius and [. . .]tarchus to Hermias (?) greeting. You write us about the fact that you are punished (?) .... Try therefore to have courage in order that you may not be troubled again. Stratonicus has written us about the fact that you (or: about the oil) ... because there is none. We have sent grapes. Do not hesitate to write us ... give in pledge the .... Goodbye.
